title: German Intelligence Must Temporarily Halt an Extremist Label for the AfD, Court Rules
summary_full: The domestic intelligence agency can still spy on the far-right party, and the ruling may not change Germans’ views, but it is a symbolic victory for the AfD.
summary_public: The domestic intelligence agency can still spy on the far-right party, and the ruling may not change Germans’ views, but it is a symbolic victory for the AfD.

DE.label: negative
DE.evidence: German Intelligence Must Temporarily Halt an Extremist Label for the AfD, Court Rules
